extract_lltf.name: extract_lltf
extract_lltf.desc: EXTRACT: FSM fills circ_buf, outputs L-LTF (160) + passthrough (~26k)

compute_fine_cfo.name: compute_fine_cfo
compute_fine_cfo.desc: COMPUTE: autocorrelation on 160 L-LTF samples, CFO estimation

apply_correction.name: apply_correction
apply_correction.desc: APPLY: NCO-based frequency correction on ~26k passthrough samples
